entry.title: House of the Dragon S1E09 Explained

media:group.media:title: House of the Dragon S1E09 Explained
media:group.media:description:
Get a free audiobook with an Audible trial: http://www.audible.com/asx
This video has no spoilers for House of the Dragon beyond Episode 9. It does have spoilers for the original Game of Thrones show.
Weekly Alt Shift X HOTD livestreams every Sunday at ~10:15pm Eastern Time, right after each episode -- then an Explained video later in the week!
Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCveZqqGewoyPiacooywP5Ig?sub_confirmation=1 Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/AltShiftX Twitter: https://twitter.com/altshiftx Podcast: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWW6C71HUEN5iBuX8qq5xxw Audio feed: https://anchor.fm/alt-shift-zzz
Images and video from Game of Thrones used under fair use. Images from The World of Ice and Fire used with permission from Random House. Map from The Lands of Ice and Fire. Aegon I by Magali Villeneuve: www.magali-villeneuve.com Targ triangles art by NaomiMakesArt: https://twitter.com/NaomiMakesArt https://www.instagram.com/naomimakesart/ Maelor by Sofia Golovanova: https://www.artstation.com/jdwis Mushroom and Eustace by Rossy Does Drawings: https://twitter.com/rossysculpts
Special thanks to Patrons Cameron Weiss, Ryan Steele, Harry, Shane Veglia, Jason Rattray, NotGac, Tim Cunniff, Tessa Campbell-Kelly, T. Ledoux, Ord X, Ruven Dewender, Doctor Folter, MaxPal, Jake.
#HotD
